instructions: Review entries, then set include_on_site to true. Run: python scripts/generate_html.py

vulnerabilities.title: Soliton Systems K.K FileZen
vulnerabilities.name: Soliton Systems K.K FileZen OS Command Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Soliton Systems K.K FileZen contains an OS command injection vulnerability when an user logs-in to the affected product and sends a specially crafted HTTP request.
vulnerabilities.short_description: Soliton Systems K.K FileZen contains an OS command injection vulnerability when an user logs-in to the affected...
vulnerabilities.fix: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.
